piiksuma.database

Class QueryMapper<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • piiksuma.database.Mapper<T>
      • piiksuma.database.QueryMapper<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Mapped class type. Used to check asigments when returning query results. 

    public class QueryMapper<T>
extends Mapper<T>
    Database conection and data retrieving wrapper. Automatically maps retreved data
    Author:
    luastan, CardamaS99, danimf99, alvrogd, OswaldOswin1, Marcos-marpin

      • createQuery

        public QueryMapper<T> createQuery(String query)
        Defines the sentence to be queried to the database
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Returns the Mapper instance

      • list

        public List<T> list(boolean useForeignKeys)
        Returns a list with the query results propperly mapped to the Class defined at defineClass(Class)
        Parameters:
        useForeignKeys - When true will attempt to find foreign keys when the class representing the atributes has the MapperTable annotation present
        Returns:
        Mapped objects from the query

      • list

        public List<T> list()
        Does the same as list(boolean) with the foreign keys boolean as true
        Returns:
        Mapped objects list

      • defineClass

        public QueryMapper<T> defineClass(Class<? extends T> mappedClass)
        Defines the class to be used in the mapping process.
        Overrides:
        defineClass in class Mapper<T>
        Parameters:
        mappedClass - Class used to map the query results
        Returns:
        The QueryMapper instance

      • defineParameters

        public QueryMapper<T> defineParameters(Object... parametros)
        Defines the parameters used when executing the query. This parameters are defined with ? in the createQuery(String) String
        Overrides:
        defineParameters in class Mapper<T>
        Parameters:
        parametros - Parameter list to be inserted into the PreparedStatement used to query the database
        Returns:
        The QueryMapper instance

      • mapList

        public List<Map<String,Object>> mapList()
        When the Cass to be used wasn't defined with defineClass(Class) this method resturns the query results mapped into a list containing Map instances with the column names used as keys in the Map, and the values from the result tuples
        Returns:
        Map list with the query Results

      • findFirst

        public T findFirst(boolean useForeignkeys)
        From the results, returns the first one. Usefull when querying a single item. It performs the whole Mapping process which can be seen as ineficient. For increased efficiency add limit(1) to de query.
        Parameters:
        useForeignkeys - Same atribute as in list(boolean)
        Returns:
        First element from the results

      • findFirst

        public T findFirst()
        Check findFirst(boolean). Does the same as findFirst(true)
        Returns:
        First element from the results
